issue.title: [C++] Visual Studio 2017 Appveyor builds failing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1375](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1375). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Seems unrelated to code changes

[~Max Risuhin] do you have time to take a look?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1375?focusedCommentId=16134131) by Max Risuhin (Max Risuhin):*
